sub_title: Team lead and researcher biological control of pests and invasive plants
summary:
I work on the biological control of invasive species and crop pests, making use of insects and mites that are their natural enemies. I investigate the underlying species interactions, ecology, demography and evolution. Together with professionals and stakeholders worldwide I develop and evaluate new management strategies in the field.
Keywords: researcher, entomologist, project manager, clear communication, organistion skills, enthusiasm
